column2: MASSACHUSETTS DMV WRITTEN TEST
column6: MA

column2: Question Text
column6: Answer2 Text

column2: 1. This warning sign:
column4: shows the current speed limit that all vehicles traveling in the direction of the arrow must not exceed.
column6: tells drivers that the minimum safe speed is 45 MPH.
column8: provides advance notice to upcoming speed limit change.
column10: indicates the suggested highest safe speed.

column2: 2. This road sign means:
column6: Pedestrian crossing ahead

column2: 3. BAC is expressed in:
column6: percentage of alcohol to blood.
column8: ounces of alcohol in your blood.

column2: 4. This road sign means:
column6: Bicycles have the same rights as other vehicles
column8: Bicycles cross or ride beside traffic
column10: Yield to motorcyles, but not to bicycles

column2: 5. The following symptoms are associated with drowsy driving:
column4: You don’t remember driving the last few miles.
column6: You continue to yawn.
column8: Your eyes go out of focus by themselves.

column2: 6. This road sign means:
column6: Two-way traffic ahead
column10: You can travel in either direction in this lane

column2: 7. Drivers may continue carefully through a yellow light if:
column4: an emergency vehicle is crossing your lane.
column6: there are no pedestrians crossing.
column10: they already are within the intersection.

column2: 8. When driving on slick roads, drivers should:
column6: drive as they would on dry roads.

column2: 9. If a vehicle is approaching with high beams, drivers should look __________ until the vehicle passes.
column6: to the right of the road
column8: to the left of the road
column10: at the center of the road

column2: 10. This sign means:
column4: The center lane is shared for left turns.
column6: Left turns in both directions of travel are not permitted.

column2: 11. Which of the following must you obey over the others?
column6: Stop sign

column2: 12. Where must a pedestrian walk when there are no sidewalks?
column4: On the left side of the road, behind slower vehicles.
column6: On the side of the road, in the same direction of traffic.
column8: On the side of the road, facing the traffic.
column10: In the middle of the road, facing oncoming traffic.

column2: 13. This is the shape and color of a ________ sign.
column6: stop

column2: 14. An octagonal sign means that drivers must:
column6: come to a complete stop at the marked stop line.

column2: 15. Which shape is a railroad advance warning sign?
column6: Crossbuck

column2: 16. On slippery roads, drivers should:
column4: increase their speed to avoid hydroplaning.
column6: reduce the reaction distance.
column10: leave more space in front of their vehicle.

column2: 17. When you reach an intersection with a stop sign, you should:
column4: check your rearview mirror, look left, then right, then proceed.
column6: stop, look left, then right, then left again.
column8: stop, look right, then left, then right again.
column10: follow the vehicle ahead of you.

column2: 18. What should you do when an aggressive driver confronts you?
column6: Challenge the aggressive driver with increased speed.
column10: Avoid eye contact with the aggressive driver.

column2: 19. Who is most at risk?
column6: Drivers who are driving on long, boring roads.

column2: 20. This sign means:
column6: The divided highway on which drivers are traveling ends ahead.
column8: The highway ahead is divided into two one-way roadways.

column2: 21. For protection, motorcyclists are required to:
column6: keep their headlights and taillights on at all times.
column8: signal turns, lane changes and stops.

column2: 22. A red traffic sign means?
column6: Construction warning.

column2: 23. You must come to a full stop at a yield sign:
column6: Always.
column10: Before you decrease speed and reach the intersection.

column2: 24. If you get on a wrong expressway exit, you must:
column4: drive in reverse to return to the expressway.
column6: get off at the next exit and look for signs that tell you how to return to the expressway.
column8: use the the exit ramp to accelerate to expressway speed and blend with traffic.
column10: make a U-turn and return to the expressway.

column2: 25. This sign warns drivers of:
column6: a dip in the road. Drivers should be ready to stop if the dip is filled with water.
column8: a bridge ahead, wide enough to accommodate two lanes of traffic, but with very little clearance.
